name: @peckhamcc/lambda-account-token-exchange
description: Exchange login token for full version
author: Alex Potsides

scripts.build: cp ../config/index.js config.js && cp ../lambda-lib/account.js account.js && cp ../lambda-lib/middleware.js middleware.js
scripts.build:dev: cp ../config/index.js config.js && cp ../lambda-lib/dev-account.js account.js && cp ../lambda-lib/middleware.js middleware.js
